title: As a Morgana main mid, I love the lane challenge against AD champs....

replies.body:
>  : ...fuck it, just kill me...

nope, he will spam laugh + taunt + mastery before killing u.

and than he will say : ez, outplayed ... after killing u.

thats how its done as an ad vs ap mate.
works with every ap mage atm.

By the time they get any of those items you've already been outscaled and can't reliably kill them anyway. Quit whining.

Besides, the irony is that Morgana has been a Zed counter forever since zhonyas completely cock-blocks his ult. I guess Edge of Night is just them returning the favor.
